00040 void OurRenderer::parse_file(std::string filename) {
00041     _parser = new ParserYAML(filename);
00042     if (!_parser->is_correct()) exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00043     if (!_parser->is_well_formed()) exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00044 }
00045 
00050 void OurRenderer::build_scene() {
00051     _scene = _parser->generate_scene();
00052     delete _parser;
00053 }
00054 
00059 void OurRenderer::build_photon_tree()
00060 {
00061     _raytracer = new PhotonMappingBased(_scene) ;
00062 }
00063 
00073 void OurRenderer::raytrace(bool the_photon_map = false)
00074 {
00075     if (the_photon_map) {
00076         Image res = _raytracer->render_photonmap(_scene) ;
00077         _image = new Image(res.get_res_x(), res.get_res_y()) ;
00078         (*_image) = res ;
00079     }
00080     else {
00081         Image res = _raytracer->render(_scene) ;
00082         _image = new Image(res.get_res_x(), res.get_res_y()) ;
00083         (*_image) = res ;
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00093 void OurRenderer::save_to(std::string str)
00094 {
00095     _image->save_to_TGA(str.c_str()) ;
00096 }
